fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Single market, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: World Trade Center Amsterdam Tower I, Level 3 Strawinskylaan 1847
eu_initiatives: Legislation related to equities trading and post-trading services, especially regulatory initiatives with an impact on central counterparties and clients of central counterparty clearing services.  Corporate activities, such as mergers and acquisitions, of market infrastructures in the trading, clearing and settlement sectors.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EuroCCP is a central counterparty for trades in equities.  Our business goal is to minimize post-trade costs, maximize netting, increase capital efficiency, and continuously improve risk management for the benefit of our clients.
